value:
There's nothing more exhausting than
dealing with incompetent leadership.
It's a problem anywhere you go.

I prefer not to draw attention to
myself, so you could say I have an
appreciation for a ninja's abilities.

I've had some practice muffling my
footsteps. It's handy when I want
to sneak off for a nap.

If you need anything moved, I'm your
man. Whether it's treasure or trade
secrets, your cargo's safe with me.

This outfit is perfect for blending into
the shadows. Just what I need when
I'm looking to sleep uninterrupted.

Got a special cargo delivery here with
your name on it. Take a look—says
it's from $Nf.

Thought I was asleep? Joke's on you.
Maybe you're the one who should be
paying more attention.

The best way to blend in? Just be as
average as possible. Works for me.

I kind of like working in the dark. The
only real problem is the constant
temptation to fall sleep.

If you really think that highly of me,
I guess the least I can do is try not
to disappoint you.

I'm Haar. I run cargo. Not sure how
I ended up dressed like this, exactly,
but I'm willing to roll with it.

*yawn* Oh, it's you. No, I'm awake.
Just trying out a technique that one
of the ninja taught me.$k$pNo, really! The point is to let your
target think you're asleep and then
strike while their guard is down.$k$pYou seriously think I'm making this
up? Feel free to put me to the test.
Just, uh, let me know beforehand.$k$pAnyway, I appreciate you checking in.
Are you actually checking up on all
the festivalgoers one at a time?$k$pSounds exhausting. And maybe a bit
controlling. But I guess it's a comfort
to know you're looking out for us.$k$pTell you what—if it makes you feel
better, I'll get all my duties taken care
of before I take my nap. Sound OK?
Nothing personal.
It's over.
Agh! More work!
Dismissed.
Just my luck...
What exactly have you gotten me into here?
Watch your hands. You could hurt yourself.
I figure somebody else would enjoy this getup more than me.
Espionage is very useful. No denying that.
*yawn* Huh? No, of course I'm awake. Don't you trust me?
I bet a peaceful scene like this would've made General Shiharam very happy.
I could use a nap. Know any quiet spots around here?
Sure.
Uh huh...
Here goes.
